评论概述: Attractive design but size up to be safe
评论详情: I really like the ruching on this top. It’s attractive and it makes the sizing pretty forgiving. The ruching provides a very flattering, body hugging effect that's great for camoflauging imperfections. I ordered an xl which is one size larger than my typical size (for reference, I’m just over 6 feet tall and typically wear a size 10/12 or large) and feel like it fits me perfectly. Given how forgiving the ruched fit is, I probably could've ordered my regular size and been fine but I'm glad I erred on the side of caution. While overall I really like this top, I have a few complaints that knocked my rating down from 5 stars to 4. 1) The neckline isn't finished very well and there's a large white itchy tag sewn into the back. Because it isn't finished well, the top seam wants to turn inside out once the garment is on my body, which means this ugly white tag is hanging on the outside of the top in the middle of my back. I cut the tag off but it still left a bit of very visible white tag behind on my black top. To fix it properly I’d have to unpick the seam to remove it completely then restich by hand to repair it. My sewing skills are nonexistent so this idea is a nonstarter for me. 2)  While it's easy to pull the top off the shoulder, keeping it there and making it look attractive requires constant readjustment. I think this top is flattering enough to justify this annoyance. 3) The way the sleeves are made is kind of peculiar. They sort of look like cap sleeves that look a bit funky when worn off the shoulder (as shown in product photos). I'm still quite pleased with this garment and plan to wear it to an upcoming holiday party. My solution to hiding the ugly remnants of white tag without doing any actual sewing was to fold over the top seam to hide the tag then I fixed it in place using a liquid stitch product.
Cute top, but the sizing is a bit off. Recommend ordering 1-2 sizes up. Also the sleeves are way shorter than they look in the photo. They're more like cap sleeves.
